entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tisdale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
